mapper.select:
select st.id,so.name as organization_name,su.actual_name as name,su.sex,su.tel,st.train_date from sys_train as st,sys_organization as so,sys_user as su
st.train_person = su.id and st.organization_id = so.id
and st.organization_id = #{organizationId}
and tel like concat('%',#{tel},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into sys_train( organization_id, train_person, train_date, create_id, create_date )values ( #{organizationId}, #{trainPerson}, #{trainDate}, #{createId}, #{createDate} )
